summary: After failing to get into university, a soft city boy randomly picks a job in forestry.
cast: Masami Nagasawa|Hideaki Itô|Shôta Sometani|Yûki Furukawa|Nana Seino|Akira Emoto|Naomi Nishida|Yoji Tanaka|Ken Mitsuishi|Yûka|Ken Aoki|Yoshimasa Kondô|Makita Sports|Masashi Arifuku|Yuriko Hirooka|Mao Asou|Daikichi Sugawara|Shunpei Kawagoishi
title: Wood Job!: Kamusari nânâ nichijô
